args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set Filter Topology

/-- Prove that every compact metric space K has a countable base. -/
theorem secondCountable_of_compact (K : Type*) [MetricSpace K] [CompactSpace K] : SecondCountableTopology K := by sorry
